name: John Doe
bio: A passionate web developer and lifelong learner.
goals: I'm passionate about becoming the absolute best programmer and developer I can be, someone who approaches every challenge with a commitment to perfection. Looking ahead, I see myself as an entrepreneur, translating my technical expertise and drive for excellence into creating something truly impactful and successful.
achievements: Gold medalist at cluster-level in chess

certificate.title: MERN Stack Certification
certificate.description: Completed a comprehensive MERN stack training covering HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB. Developed several real-world projects demonstrating full-stack proficiency.

projects.title: Mern Blog Website
projects.description: A responsive web application using mern Implemented JWT GoogleOAuth authentication Redux Toolkit for state management admin dashboard features

projects.title: Mern Real Estate
projects.description: Set up Reactjs with Tailwind CSS implemented dynamic pages JWT and Google OAuth authentication and Redux Toolkit for state management

projects.title: Barber Landing Page
projects.description: Responsive barber landing page using React with sections like Home, Services, Gallery, About, and Contact for a modern, engaging experience.
